## Research idea essay

**Assignment Description**: For this assignment write a 1-2 page essay presenting your
research idea. 

Begin by describing the puzzle or issue that you will be analyzing in your research
paper (if possible, try to formulate a hypothesis). 

Describe why this is important, why should we
care? Make sure to explain in detail what is your unit of analysis. Then, describe some plausible
sources of data or information that would help you answer and or assess your question. 

Finally,
try to anticipate what would be your finndings.


Assignment due: Wednesday April 22
